channel.title: Website - Kicksecure Forums
channel.description: Topics in the 'Website' category Issues and improvements with the Kicksecure website.

item.title: Cannot login to onion version of the forums
item.dc:creator: qtzvytqr77x4t5cq
item.description:
I am able to login to https://forums.kicksecure.com over tor.

I am not able to login to http://forums.w5j6stm77zs6652pgsij4awcjeel3eco7kvipheu6mtr623eyyehj4yd.onion. It gives me an “unknown error.” If I click the button to send a login email instead, it tells me error 403.

I prefer to login via the onion link because it is presumably safer / more anonymous.

It is possible that you are already aware of this error, but I figured I would report it anyways. Thank you.

3 posts - 2 participants

Read full topic
item.source: Cannot login to onion version of the forums

item.title: Modernize Website
item.dc:creator: anon87354919
item.description:
Current state of the website is not the best. It looks obsolete. Images are pixelated in most instances. And even if they were not pixelated, they would still be archaic, because they are basically windows xp era icons.

Second problem: website is badly structured. Too many unnecessary pieces if you ask me. Also the website does not make the organization clear.

Also the name kicksecure is just too long. And also, having a .com domain makes the wrong impression.

Suggestion:

  • Modernize images
  • Too many images also tbh, you don’t need to declare thunderbird and vlc are default on the homepage. Also the thunderbird logo is more than a year old. Anyway
  • Modernize logo (simplify)
  • Consider using kicksec instead of kicksecure
  • Write a manifesto where you declare the principles (can draft one if you like)
  • Write policies and stuff clearly
  • Lay down a structure. What is kicksecure? I don’t know some random set of repos and a website. Make it more organized and organizaiton like. Make it possible to become members. Levels of memebership I don’t know something. Make the impression that you are organized (and also be organized).
  • Consider posting regular blogs or whatever, keep in touch with the peasants
  • Where is the sauce? What if I have a pull for the website? Consider making it public or making it easier to find out
  • Have a voting and proposal mechanisms based on members
  • Declare principles and whatnot like other free software projects (clearly)

What is kicksecure? If the answer is something other than “whonix without tor”, than the website gives the wrong impression. 450 links and sections for virtualbox and kvm and stuff. Wow, is this a virtual only os? Well I guess, no one ever has this kind of stuff on the front page.

So I suggest: No vm stuff ever. One link and one download to rule them all, a live installation image. For this another post is coming.

2 posts - 2 participants

Read full topic

item.title: Domain clientDeleteProhibited status
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
ValidBot » Validation Report suggested the clientDeleteProhibited to be set for the kicksecure.com domain name. Hence I contacted the support for the domain registrar and asked about this topic where there is not a lot information about available on search engines at time of writing.

namecheap.com support reply:

(For kicksecure.com.)

We can set up the clientDeleteProhibited status for the kicksecure.com domain name. Please note that this status indicates that it is not possible to delete the domain name registration, which can prevent unauthorized deletions resulting from hijacking and/or fraud. Having this status enabled, it is not possible to transfer the domain out of the current Registrar.

Please let us know if you would like to proceed with this option.

I asked the support to proceed.

gandi.net reply

No, this status prevent the domain name to be deleted, even in the case it’s not renewed.

This status in only used for some legal issue, to prevent ‘proof’ to be deleted.

(For whonix.org.)

I’ll ask gandi.net about this again in case namecheap.com proceeds with setting the clientDeleteProhibited flag.

2 posts - 1 participant

Read full topic

item.title: Remove/Replace broken links at kicksecure.com
item.dc:creator: nurmagoz
item.description:
If we view the source code of https://www.kicksecure.com/ page there are:

1- Search for forums.kicksecure.org

<a href="https://forums.kicksecure.org" data-modal="modal-explain-community" target="_blank">

there is no kicksecure.org, it should be .com

2- Search for https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1180410

<a target="_blank" class="external text" href="https://dl.acm.org/citation.cfm?id=1180410">
  de-anonymization of Tor onion services

URL broken/changed, check if it can be replaced entirely or with archive one.

3- There is no anbox homepage for anbox-kicksecure feature

Kicksecure – 4 Nov 22

Anbox

4- /wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images → https://www.kicksecure.com/wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images → Doesnt exist

  <p>
    Downloads are
    <a href="/wiki/Verifying_Software_Signatures">signed</a>
    so genuine Whonix releases can be
    <a href="/wiki/Verify_the_Whonix_images">verified</a>.
  </p>

3 posts - 2 participants
